label: accreditationCertificate
comment: The evidence that supports the authroty under which the attestation is issued - eg an accreditation certificate.

rangeIncludes.comment: A structure to provide a URL link plus metadata associated with the link.

domainIncludes.comment: The authority under which a conformity claim is issued.  For example a national accrediation authority may accredit a test lab to issue test certificates about a product against a standard.
